data.eml:eml: A taxonomic review of the anilline genus Zeanillus Jeannel (Coleoptera: Carabidae: Bembidiini) of New Zealand, with descriptions of seven new species, re-classification of the species, and notes on their biogeography and evolution

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sokolov, Igor M. (2016): A taxonomic review of the anilline genus Zeanillus Jeannel (Coleoptera: Carabidae: Bembidiini) of New Zealand, with descriptions of seven new species, re-classification of the species, and notes on their biogeography and evolution. Zootaxa 4196 (1): 1-37, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4196.1.1
